vocabularyItems.english: This restaurant is much better than the one we visited.
The weather today is worse than it was yesterday afternoon.
This is the best pizza I have ever tasted anywhere.
That was the worst movie I have seen this year.
I need more time to complete this difficult assignment properly.
Try to eat less sugar for better health and wellness.
She is the most talented singer in our entire school.
This is the least expensive option available right now.
My new apartment is bigger than my old one significantly.
This phone is smaller and lighter than the previous model.
We need a larger table for the dinner party tonight.
The mountain is much higher than I initially thought it was.
Please speak in a lower voice in the library area.
This new computer runs much faster than my old one.
The traffic is slower during rush hour in the morning.
Learning online is easier than attending traditional classes for some people.
This exam was much harder than I expected it to be.
There must be a simpler way to solve this problem.
Shopping online is often cheaper than buying in physical stores.
Organic food is usually costlier than regular produce items.
Is there a nearer hospital to our house than this?
The beach is farther away than I remembered from before.
Come closer so I can hear you speak more clearly.
The movie was longer than three hours which felt excessive.
My hair is shorter now after the haircut yesterday afternoon.
This road is wider and safer for driving than before.
The path becomes narrower as you climb the mountain higher.
This book is much thicker than the one I read.
She looks thinner after following a strict diet plan recently.
This suitcase is heavier than I can carry by myself.
The new laptop is much lighter and more portable now.
Regular exercise makes you stronger and healthier over time gradually.
He felt weaker after the long illness last winter season.
The sun seems brighter today than it was yesterday morning.
The room looks darker without the lights turned on properly.
Can you speak louder please because I cannot hear well?
This neighborhood is much quieter than the city center area.
The house looks much cleaner after the thorough cleaning today.
My shoes got dirtier after walking through the muddy field.
This dress is prettier than the one you showed earlier.
The new building design is uglier than the original plan.
He became richer after his business started succeeding greatly last year.
The economic crisis made many families poorer than before unfortunately.
I feel much happier now than I did last year.
She looked sadder after hearing the disappointing news this morning.
The store has a wide selection of products to choose.
This restaurant offers a great variety of international cuisines daily.
They have a wide range of sizes available in stock.
The gift box contains an assortment of delicious chocolates inside.
Let's compare the prices before making a final purchase decision.
The contrast between the two paintings is quite striking indeed.
Our opinions differ on this matter but we respect each.
It's hard to distinguish between the twins at first glance.
Can you differentiate between these two similar products for me?
Your idea is very similar to mine in many ways.
The two sisters look very much alike in appearance today.
The twins are wearing identical outfits which confuses people often.
This qualification is equivalent to a university degree in value.
All people should have equal rights and opportunities in society.
Unlike his brother he prefers staying at home quietly.
Contrary to popular belief chocolate can be healthy sometimes.
This product is superior in quality to all competitors available.
The counterfeit products are inferior to the original genuine ones.
Speaking multiple languages gives you a competitive advantage in careers.
Not having a car is a disadvantage in rural areas.
Regular exercise has many health benefits for your body overall.
The main drawback of this plan is the high cost.
Each proposal has its own merits and weaknesses to consider.
The plan has a major flaw that needs fixing immediately.
Communication is one of her greatest strengths as a leader.
Chocolate is my biggest weakness I cannot resist it ever.
Let's discuss the pros and cons before making decision.
The main con of living downtown is the noise.
Try to focus on the positive aspects of the situation.
Negative thinking can affect your mental health badly over time.
The weather forecast looks favorable for our outdoor picnic tomorrow.
The economic conditions are unfavorable for new business startups currently.
Working from home is preferable to commuting daily for hours.
Living near good schools is highly desirable for young families.
Smoking is an undesirable habit with serious health consequences always.
Your performance is acceptable but could be improved significantly still.
Such rude behavior is completely unacceptable in our workplace environment.
This job seems suitable for someone with your skills exactly.
These shoes are unsuitable for hiking in rough mountain terrain.
Please wear appropriate clothing for the formal business meeting tomorrow.
That joke was inappropriate for the serious occasion we attended.
This location is ideal for opening a new restaurant business.
Her performance was absolutely flawless from start to finish.
Your presentation was excellent and very well prepared thoroughly today.
She received an award for her outstanding academic performance this year.
What is your preferred method of communication these days?
Is there an alternative route to avoid the heavy traffic?
Each region has its own distinct culture and traditions today.
This is a comparative study of two different teaching methods.
She used superlative adjectives to describe the amazing experience yesterday.
Exercise in moderate amounts is good for your health.
Extreme weather conditions can be very dangerous for travelers.
The average temperature in summer is thirty degrees celsius.
This student shows exceptional talent in mathematics and science.
It was just an ordinary day with nothing special happening.

liarGameData.explanation: A2 learners must master comparative (better, more expensive) and superlative (best, most expensive) forms.
liarGameData.practice: good→better→best, bad→worse→worst. For long adjectives: beautiful→more beautiful→most beautiful
liarGameData.tip: One-syllable adjectives add -er/-est. Two+ syllables use more/most. Learn irregular forms!
